ticket.title: default session_path does not respect RAILS_RELATIVE_URL_ROOT
ticket.original-body:
This is not as advertised in actionpack/lib/action_controller/cgi_process.rb : "the path for which this session applies. Defaults to the directory of the CGI script."
Using ENV['RAILS_RELATIVE_URL_ROOT'] in the same file's DEFAULT_SESSION_OPTIONS
could fix this easily.
